content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad we're on the same page about the rental price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in the newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. What's the lowest price you can offer for it, considering it's close to all important facilities?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Let's start with 1000 Euros. I'm sure you understand that the prime location and amenities make this an exceptional apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location is great, but I'm looking for the best deal. Can you lower the price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I can go down to 950 Euros. This is the best I can offer right now.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but I'm still looking for a lower price. How about 900 Euros?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I can't go that low. I'll meet you in the middle at 925 Euros. This is the lowest I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm not sure if I can afford 925 Euros. Can you give me some time to think about it?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Sure, take your time. Remember, this is a great deal for a newly built, unfurnished, 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding. I'll let you know my decision soon.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Alright, I'll be waiting for your decision. Remember, the apartment's location and amenities make it a great deal at 925 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
